name: isshiki akane | vividred operation
description:
Please note that this is for personal use only. I cannot take responsibility for any harm or loss incurred.

There might be some imperfections, but I hope you will enjoy it nonetheless. The recommended setting is 0.6.
Please check the High Resolution Correction checkbox

★I look forward to your warm support.
https://ko-fi.com/nitokaro

★Recommended checkpoints:
Pettanko has done an animated style model comparison. Please see this gallery
https://civitai.com/models/85707/tsube-aika

I have created an image model of Isshiki Akane, the protagonist of Vividred Operation.

I tried to mix the models, but overall, it overfitted, resulting in very poor reproduction of the outfit. Therefore, I have split it into two models, one before transformation and one after.

She is cheerful and a bit silly, but she has a kind heart that won't abandon people in need. She helps with the family finances by doing part-time jobs like newspaper delivery in place of her hospitalized mother.

She also has an extraordinary love for mayonnaise, beyond the bounds of common sense.

I hope you enjoy creating scenes of her.

The flanks of the uniform are black, but this can be a bad thing and cause the arms to be black.It is very difficult to get this reproduction. We are reviewing the material.

-----------------------------------vivid team-----------------------------------
